casebody.data:
State
v.
Jonathan Douglas Richardson 272A14-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 6, 2016

Mr. Paul M. Green, Assistant Appellant Defender, Mr. David Weiss, Attorney at Law, For Richardson, Jonathan Douglas.

Mr. Gregory Butler, Mr. Paul Jackson, Assistant District Attorneys, Ms. Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of June 2016 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare Trial Transcript:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of June 2016."
